name: Small FC: 3 in 1
description:
- input the appropriate number to start the game
- use cursor keys and  WASD to control in games
- to pause games press P
- in the Detective game click on items and characters
- there are some easter eggs, find them ;)

To run the game in Windows download the archive, unpack it and run the file Small_FC_3_in_1.exe

Credits:
